name: Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX)
what_did:
King Bhumibol ruled Thailand for 70 years — longer than any other Thai king.
He worked to help farmers, improve schools, and build peace in the country.
He played music, took photos, and loved science.
why_matters:
King Bhumibol was deeply loved by the Thai people.
He used his ideas and kindness to make life better for many.
His long reign helped bring stability to Thailand.

questions.q: How long did King Bhumibol rule?
What country was he king of?

fun_fact: King Bhumibol composed jazz songs — and even played saxophone on the radio!
